headline: Ohio governor Mike DeWine turns down Republican primary debate invite
author: Associated Press
sentences: The nonpartisan Ohio Debate Commission said DeWine did not give a reason for declining to participate in the March 29 debate, adding that it hopes the governor will reconsider.
Mike DeWine, facing a competitive 2022 reelection race, will skip this month’s Republican primary debate, event organizers said Thursday.
DeWine campaign manger Brenton Temple said the governor is always publicly accessible.
